question: List any five features of Java?
Static functions can be accessed using null reference
What is the size of double variable?
What is the default value of short variable?
Which of the following stands true about default modifier of class members?
options: By default, variables, methods and constructors can be accessed by subclass only
By default, variables, methods and constructors can be accessed by any class lying in any package
By default, variables, methods and constructors can be accessed by any class lying in the same package
answer: By default, variables, methods and constructors can be accessed by any class lying in the same package

question: What is class variable?
options: class variables are static variables within a class but outside any method
class variables are variables defined inside methods, constructors or blocks
class variables are variables within a class but outside any method
answer: class variables are static variables within a class but outside any method

question: What kind of variables a class can consist of?
options: class variables, local variables, instance variables
answer: class variables, local variables, instance variables
